title: when you literally run it down for 20 minutes
body: I got my account banned right, that was justified and I was kinda positively surprised this happened, then I reopened the client and what did I see? na fam me inting was fine I was just banned for calling the 0-11 hail of blades teemo a inter, this system is a fucking joke lmao

replies.body: You cant get a permban just for calling someone an inter, other effort was made.

he just nicely called him an inter and a troll in the course of 12-20 messages and asked to report and threw in few stfus and you are so bad etc

how usually things works and how i got mine ;D
calling someone an inter repeatedly, I can post the chat logs for you if you care, not a permaban though but you can also definitely get permad for it.
when your mothers tongue is english but you still can't speak it better than some random dude from finland lmao

> [{quoted}](name=Hi im 12,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=T9AbIpXe,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-07-30T23:12:45.825+0000)
>
> when your mothers tongue is english but you still can't speak it better than some random dude from finland lmao

Apparently I can communicate in a way that does not result in an account ban?

Pretty sure Iâ€™m doing just alright.

> [{quoted}](name=Hi im 12,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=T9AbIpXe,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2019-07-31T00:05:13.030+0000)
>
> yes fucking up english really badly prevents the bot from picking up the shit you say :^)

Maybe you should take a lesson from me then ?
that's a great idea, lets just all learn how to not speak english so the league of legends AI can't ban us!
When your 12 and try to insult people in the internet lmao.
I hate it when my 12 gets out of the basement and starts insulting people, I really need to chain him up better.
Remember guys, you're= you are. Not your.
